import { useState,useRef } from "react"; import Close from "../../Images/times-solid.svg" import socket from "../../socket"; import "./modal.scss"; const Modal = ({ show, close, userID, userName }) => { const [ data, setData ] = useState({ title: '', heading: '', context: '', owner: userID, url: '', userName: userName }) const handlerChange = (event) => { const {name, value} = event.target; setData(prevInput => { return{ ...prevInput, [name]:value } }) } const handleClick = (event) => { socket.emit("grope_create", data); window.location.reload() } return(
{show ?
close()}>
e.stopPropagation()}>
